sect1.title: FlyMine funding
sect1.para: The FlyMine project has been generously supported by the Wellcome Trust (Grant no. 067205) for 5 years, subject to a review in year 3, awarded to M. Ashburner, G. Micklem, S. Russell, K. Lilley and K. Mizuguchi.
Dr. G Micklem was supported by the BBSRC and the Isaac Newton Trust until March 2004.
Wenyan Ji is supported by The Cambridge-MIT Institute.
